          <title>

          <description>
            <string language="en">In havrutah , learners read the text of Birkat Hamazon and determine the main themes of the prayer.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Im havrutah lesen Anfänger den Text von Birkat

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans le havrutah, les étudiants lisent le texte 
de Birkat Hamazon et déterminent les thèmes principaux de la 
prière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No havrutah, os learners lêem o texto de Birkat 
Hamazon e determinam os temas principais do prayer.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel havrutah, i principianti leggono il testo di

            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο havrutah, οι αρχάριοι διαβάζουν το κείμενο

προσευχής.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">En havrutah, los principiantes leen el texto de
